PAD_SpottedAmbush.synopsis: This PAD plays if players pass a successful Perception check when entering an abandoned village. Goblins are sneaking around in the village, setting up an ambush.

individual_metadata.synopsis: This dialogue triggers when players enter a village being guarded by goblins. The goblins are on rooftops - the player may either be on the ground or on the rooftops with them (if they've snuck in). If the player has passed a perception check beforehand, the dialogue starts while the goblins are still getting into place for an ambush. Otherwise, the goblins are already in place, surrounding the player.If the player is not a drow, the goblins will attack the player at the end of the dialogue unless players can talk them out of it.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the Abandoned Village from the main gate: goto 61; 27; 402.

CheckpointGuardsWarning.synopsis: Backup guard protecting the entrance to a village the goblins have seized

Warning.synopsis: Goblin warrior standing guard in the abandoned village - she's eager for a fight and slightly let down if we talk our way past.

PatrollingGoblin.synopsis: A goblin is patrolling around the abandoned village on the lookout for intruders. He doesn't want to be bothered.

CheckpointGuards.synopsis: This goblin is guarding the entrance to a town his squad have occupied. The residents are long-dead, the town abandoned, and so he's taken it upon himself to rechristen the village as 'Bogrot'.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: When reading the session summaries the following relationships emerge. In the unnamed session (with an empty key) the dialogue happens when players enter a goblin‐guarded village. The dialogue description explicitly states: if players passed a Perception check beforehand, the PAD_SpottedAmbush session plays so that the dialogue begins while the goblins are still in the process of getting into position for an ambush; otherwise the goblins are already fully in place when the dialogue begins. This indicates an ordering dependency: if the perception check is passed, PAD_SpottedAmbush must occur before the main (unnamed) dialogue session. No other session provides clear cause–effect dependencies or mutually exclusive conditions. (For example, sessions like CheckpointGuardsWarning, Warning, PatrollingGoblin, AD_StartedCombat, and CheckpointGuards appear to be situational ambient encounters whose triggers depend on location or player actions unrelated to the perception check scenario.) Therefore, the only ordering constraint we can confidently draw is that PAD_SpottedAmbush precedes the unnamed session when triggered. There are no sessions provided that are logically mutually exclusive.

17.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
17.text: You see anythin' shiny, it's ours.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Points to themselvesNodeContext: They're in charge of looting a village, and don't want players taking anything valuable.

27.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gesturing to the other goblinsNodeContext: In a loud whisper

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I know you're there. Show yourselves.

46.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
46.text: You spotted us. Good. 'S like they say...
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands on hips, cockyNodeContext: Covering up their surprise

20.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
20.text: No fun in skewerin' a pig what doesn't know he's cooked.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: There'll be no skewering happening here. Now let me pass.

93.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
93.text: Here's how this goes: you take one step further an' we'll fill your front with arrows.

24.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
24.text: Or you turn around, an' your backside gets the same treatment.

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

10.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
10.text: You're a True Soul... M-my mistake, your grace.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: ShockedNodeContext: Threatening a true soul is BAD NEWS

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Out of my way, or I'll cut you down first.

97.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
97.text: Hold up, lads! This one might be more'n we bargained for.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws up a handNodeContext: They're not scared - they're being pragmatic.

67.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
67.text: Go on, then. Just keep your nose clean.

5.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
5.text: I'd like to see you try.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling wickedly.NodeContext: They're looking forward to the fight they think they'll easily win.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Either you stand aside, or I go right through you.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Just let me by and we'll pretend this never happened.

40.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
40.text: Erh... s'pose it's best to save our strength for a real threat.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratches their head.NodeContext: Thinking hard.

99.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
99.text: Here's what I'm thinkin' - we kill you, an' I keep your ears to remember the occasion.

38.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
38.text: Gut's lettin' just anyone join these days, huh?
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shaking their head.NodeContext: Gut is a goblin priestess above them on the cult hierarchy.

92.speaker: Narrator
92.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

90.speaker: Narrator
90.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

80.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
80.text: You'll get no more trouble from us, promise.

84.speaker: Narrator
84.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

2.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
2.text: Looks like we got ourselves another brave one. Lads! You know what to do.

101.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
101.text: This ought to be fun. Lads!
101.context: NodeContext: A rally call to attack.

68.speaker: Narrator
68.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

51.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
51.text: An' I didn't want to be stuck moppin' up nosy trespassers like you.
51.context: NodeContext: The goblin is annoyed to be stuck on guard duty

14.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
14.text: Ain't no one gettin' their way today.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Curious. I had almost the exact same thought when I saw you.

61.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
61.text: That supposed to be a threat?

1.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
1.text: Got a set on you, all right. Almost makes me like you.
1.context: NodeContext: Half-impressed, half-excited to kill the player

69.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
69.text: Almost. I'm gonna enjoy pullin' off your skin when we're done.

52.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
52.text: Oi! You just walked into the wrong town.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pointing at playerNodeContext: Half-shouting, smug.

55.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
55.text: Wait - a drow? In the sun?
55.context: NodeContext: Taken aback - this is bad news for them.

49.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
49.text: Stand down! This one's got a touch of the Absolute about them.

6.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
6.text: Apologies, your lordship. Hard makin' you out from a distance.

79.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
79.text: O-of course. Come and go as you as you like.

59.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
59.text: Move it, lads! And show some respect!
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shouting around to their comradesNodeContext: Shouting around to their comrades

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I should pluck out your eyes. You're clearly not using them.

91.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
91.text: Please, your greatness. Was an honest mistake, is all.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: It'll take more than an apology. Your head will suffice.

74.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
74.text: Y'know, no one said nothin' about a drow coming through.
74.context: NodeContext: Realising the player isn't on their side.

53.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
53.text: Meanin' you ain't one of us. Change of plans, lads! Kill 'em!
53.context: NodeContext: Excited to kill a drow, for once. Shouts the last bits to their comrades.

18.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
18.text: Don't bother runnin'. My archers got decent aim and plenty of arrows.

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I'm not running, and their aim's not good enough to save you.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Spare them the trouble and just let me pass - I'll be gone in no time.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Come here and face me, you pack of gibbering snot-rags!

76.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
76.text: What, you think we was just gonna let you slip by?

8.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
8.text: Y'know, I hear we got one like you roastin' back at camp.
8.context: NodeContext: They have a dwarf roasting over a fire back at their camp.

31.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
31.text: Don't seem fair for the lads to miss out. Bet we'd get some nice cuts out of you.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I reckon my meat's too tough for runty goblin fangs.

89.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
89.text: This one's got jokes! Almost makes me like 'em.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks around at first, before turning back to the player.NodeContext: The last line turns into a threat.

64.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
64.context: NodeContext: A rally call to attack.

39.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
39.text: Well, well, boys. Looks like we got ourselves a trespasser.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands on hips, cockyNodeContext: Half-shouting, smug

65.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
65.text: Any of the lads give you trouble, they'll answer to me.

CheckpointGuardsWarning_0.speaker: Goblin Sharp-Eye
CheckpointGuardsWarning_0.context: NodeContext: We caught him idling at the entrance of a checkpoint. Not trying very hard with the lie.

Warning_0.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
Warning_0.text: More of our crowd inside, but we'll send word you're all right.
Warning_0.context: NodeContext: We've been let past a checkpoint, she's reassuring us we won't be attacked.

Warning_1.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
Warning_1.text: You'd best get running the other way, mate.
Warning_1.context: NodeContext: Tone of warning - we're trespassing and she's close to attacking us.

PatrollingGoblin_0.speaker: Goblin Brawler
PatrollingGoblin_0.text: Mind the ogres, your drowsiness. They don't got no respect.

PatrollingGoblin_1.speaker: Goblin Brawler
PatrollingGoblin_1.text: Hello, yer high and mightiness. Welcome to Bogrot.

AD_StartedCombat_0.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
AD_StartedCombat_0.text: You must got a death wish, sneakin' around in my town.

CheckpointGuards_18.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_18.text: Go on - more of us inside.

CheckpointGuards_23.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_23.text: 'Allo and welcome to Bogrot! Now, kindly - giz all your stuff.
CheckpointGuards_23.context: NodeContext: A goblin's closest approximation of courtesty, faintly mocking. He's loudly welcoming you to the town he has dubbed 'Bogrot'

CheckpointGuards_41.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_41.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

CheckpointGuards_46.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_46.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

CheckpointGuards_13.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_13.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

CheckpointGuards_57.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_57.text: Local soil-scratchers probably called it something else, but they's dead a hundred years.

CheckpointGuards_28.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_28.text: So now it's Bogrot. And you got to give over your goods.

CheckpointGuards_36.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_36.text: Hah! Nah. But it'll save us scrubbing the goo off your goods when we kill ya, see?

CheckpointGuards_7.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_7.text: How about a donation instead? Some coin for the town. ([463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

CheckpointGuards_54.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_54.text: ...Aye. Aye, I reckon that'll do nicely. The good folk of Bogrot give ya thanks.
CheckpointGuards_54.context: NodeContext: Mulling it over - he was going to kill us but we've just handed him a sizable sum so he's decided to be magnanimous

CheckpointGuards_25.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_25.text: It's a fine day, my friend. Why spoil it with killing?

CheckpointGuards_39.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_39.text: Well ain't you got a sunny disposition? The bugbear'll hate ya.

CheckpointGuards_15.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_15.text: Go wake him up - and tell 'im I sent ya.
CheckpointGuards_15.context: NodeContext: Almost rubbing his hands in glee

CheckpointGuards_27.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_27.text: Killing you would make my day, but I don't fancy cleaning up your guts afterwards. Hand over your stuff - now.

CheckpointGuards_30.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_30.text: Nice town. I'll wipe my feet on your corpse before entering.

CheckpointGuards_19.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_19.text: Temper on you, eh? Fine - keep yer goods. Our crowd own this town - we can take you any time we want.
CheckpointGuards_19.context: NodeContext: Spooked by us but trying to save face

CheckpointGuards_42.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_42.text: Hah! You got guts. Now show me what colour they are.

CheckpointGuards_20.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_20.text: Then my search is over - I'm actually here to write the Ballad of Bogrot.

CheckpointGuards_53.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_53.text: You what? Go on then, we're bored - give us a taste.

CheckpointGuards_31.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_31.text: 'Bogrot, fair Bogrot - with hills as green as goblin snot.'

CheckpointGuards_52.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_52.text: Bit flowersome, but you got something there. Go on in - reckon you can polish it up some once you've seen the place.
CheckpointGuards_52.context: NodeContext: Considering, cautiously critical but deeming our music not bad.

CheckpointGuards_26.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_26.text: Blegh. Reckon you'll make sweeter sounds once we slice you a bit.
CheckpointGuards_26.context: NodeContext: Not enjoying our music at all, moving to attack as much out of disgust as anything.

CheckpointGuards_49.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_49.text: 'Built on BONES of goblin FOE, Bogrot bears a FEAST for CROWS!'

CheckpointGuards_4.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_4.text: Aye, now that's a beat! Needs drumming, though - got some skulls inside you could use. Go on.
CheckpointGuards_4.context: NodeContext: Bopping his head, appreciating your music. Friendly pointer towards the end.

CheckpointGuards_34.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_34.text: It's not ready - I need to see the town first.

CheckpointGuards_60.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_60.text: Compromise, then. We'll pop your eyes out and give them the tour, eh?

CheckpointGuards_1.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_1.text: Take a deep breath - and attack.

CheckpointGuards_29.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_29.text: I'll give you another chance. Look at me again and choose your words carefully.

CheckpointGuards_24.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_24.text: I'm lookin' - just ain't seeing much. Might be we need to carve you open?
CheckpointGuards_24.context: NodeContext: Looking at us critically, unimpressed

CheckpointGuards_37.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_37.text: Ah. Right. Might be I was a little rude. All drow're welcome in Bogrot.
CheckpointGuards_37.context: NodeContext: Gulping nervously, sees we're a race that typically dominates and enslaves his.

CheckpointGuards_45.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_45.text: I'll give you another chance. Look at me again and choose your words carefully.

CheckpointGuards_10.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_10.text: You do not give orders to me.

CheckpointGuards_6.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_6.text: ...A True Soul. Right. Ah - welcome to Bogrot!

CheckpointGuards_50.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_50.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

CheckpointGuards_43.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_43.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

CheckpointGuards_56.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_56.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

CheckpointGuards_51.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_51.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

CheckpointGuards_5.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_5.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

CheckpointGuards_0.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_0.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

CheckpointGuards_21.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_21.text: Or whatever you want to call it - 's your town now. Heh.

CheckpointGuards_11.speaker: Narrator
CheckpointGuards_11.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

CheckpointGuards_55.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_55.text: You do not give orders to me.

CheckpointGuards_3.speaker: Goblin Warrior
CheckpointGuards_3.text: This ain't your town, friend. But it can be your grave.

CheckpointGuards_58.speaker: Player
CheckpointGuards_58.text: The only thing you're getting is a beating.
